summary: A 5-piece armor set scattered around the world with unique enchantments.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][u]DESCRIPTION[/u][b]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]
[/size]The Dark Wolf Armor set is a 5-piece set that be found in chests located at word walls around tamriel. (locations and detail below)
This armor uses the Nightingale's textures and meshes so it looks exactly the same. I may give it a unique look in the future if I decide to learn how.
[b][center]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center][center]Please post a comment with your thoughts on the mod, I'd really appreciate any feedback.
This mod was entirely designed from GarCardo's request.
Hit endorse if you like the mod, thanks.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center][/b]

[b][size=3][u]Dark Wolf Eyes[/u] (hood)[/size][/b]
Enchanted with:
[list][*][size=2]Waterbreathing[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=2]50% fire resistance[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
[/size][size=3][b][u]Hide of the Dark Wolf[/u] (armor)[/b][/size]
Enchanted With:
[list][*][size=2]50% Frost resistance[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]50% shock resistance[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]20% magic resistance (in addition to the other 50% resistance enchantments)[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=3][b][u]Claws of the Dark Wolf[/u] (gloves)[/b][/size]
Enchanted With:
[list][*][size=2]50% Poison resistance[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]50% Disease resistance
[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
[/size][size=2][size=3][b][u]Paws of the Dark Wolf[/u] (boots)[/b][/size]
Enchanted With:
[list][*][size=2]Muffle movement[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=3][b][u]Halo of the Night[/u] (ring)[/b][/size]
Enchanted With:
[list][*][size=2]Invisibility[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Night Eye[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]
[/size][/*]
[/list]NOTE:the Halo's invisibility acts just like the invisibility spell so when you attack, pickpocket, etc. the invisibility will wear off. I recommend assigning a hotkey to this item so that you can quickly re-equip it in order to refresh the effect.

[b][size=4][u]LOCATION[/u]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/b]
There are four new chests located at these outdoor word walls around the world. (the ring is found with the gloves)

[list][*][size=2]Ancient's Ascent (animal allegiance)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Bonestrewn Crest (frost breath)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Eldersblood Peak (disarm)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Dragontooth Crater (elemental fury)[/size][/*]
[/list]
[b][size=4][u]INSTALLATION[/u]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/b][/size]Install with Nexus Mod Manager or extract "Dark Wolf Armor.esp" into your Skyrim/Data folder.
Do the opposite to uninstall, but first, I recommend removing all Dark Wolf items from your inventory. (put them in a barrel somewhere)

[b][size=4][u]COMPATIBILITY[/u]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/size][/b]This mod doesn't remove or change any existing data so it should be compatible with everything unless another mod adds something to the exact same spot as one of my chests is located. If you run into another mod that seems to be incompatible please notify me and I'll see what I can do to fix it.

Thanks to GarCardo for requesting this mod.
author: NutellaPhreak
